metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38493 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Rhonabwy 0.9.99 through 1.1.x before 1.1.7 doesn't check the RSA private key length before RSA-OAEP decryption. This allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service via a crafted JWE (JSON Web Encryption) token.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38493` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librhonabwy1.1 - 1.1.8-1
rnbyc - 1.1.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rhonabwy package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.8-1').
